text:
Checksums have a newline at the end of the file.

<checksum>
    <fileset dir="${publish.base}/${build.number}">
        <include name="*.rpm"/>
    </fileset>
</checksum>


In ant 1.6.5 this was not the case. And md5 comparisons fail.
creator: gemerick@gmail.com

text: I guess it's fair to assume that we won't fix this, since it hasn't change in 1.7.1 and backwards compatibility with the 1.7.x releases is more important than compatibility with 1.6.5.
